attributes.action: Rule out a "people's vote" as a back door to a second referendum
attributes.additional_details: "People's Vote" Launch event in Camden, London, 16 April 2018.
attributes.background:
Anti brexit groups wish to coerce voters into replaying the 2016 vote,  leading to a divisive campaign and alienating much of the electorate.

Government must make it absolutely clear that there will be no rerun of the referendum in any form.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're opposed to the idea of a second referendum on the UK's membership of the EU, but we're not sure exactly what you mean by "rule out a "people's vote" as a back door to a second referendum".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
